articles.author: Tracy Swartz
articles.title: Ozempic may significantly lower the risk of Alzheimer’s disease — here’s how - New York Post
articles.description: Nearly 7 million Americans 65 and older are living with Alzheimer’s disease, which gradually destroys memory and thinking skills and the ability to perform daily tasks.
articles.content:
Type 2 diabetics may have a shot at significantly lowering their risk of Alzheimer’s disease if they take Ozempic instead of other diabetes medications, a new study finds.

articles.title: Trump, Harris make case to battleground voters as polls show tight presidential race - CBS News
